articles.title: Indian-origin student Akul Dhawan froze to death after US nightclub denied him entry - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Indian-American student Akul Dhawan froze to death near the Illinois nightclub that denied him entry last month, officials have said. Dhawan, 18, died of hypothermia following 'acute alcohol intoxication'.
articles.content: An Indian-American student froze to death near the US nightclub that denied him entry last month, officials have said. Akul Dhawan was a student at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. He was… [+1623 chars]
